description.en: Magic Stone that adds 20% Water Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Water Element.
description.ar: Magic Stone that adds 20% Water Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Water Element.
description.br: Pedra Mágica que acrescenta 20% de Ataque de Água. A arma deve ter o Elemento de Água.
description.cns: 提升武器20%水属性攻击力的魔法石。武器必须有水属性。
description.de: Magischer Stein, der den Wasserangriff deiner Waffe um 20% erhöht. Die Waffe muss das Wasserelement besitzen.
description.fi: Magic Stone that adds 20% Water Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Water Element.
description.fil: Magic Stone that adds 20% Water Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Water Element.
description.fr: Pierre Divine ajoutant à votre arme 20% d'attaque d'Eau. Votre arme doit avoir un élément d'Eau.
description.id: Magic Stone yang menambahkan 20% Serangan Air ke Senjatamu. Senjata harus memiliki Elemen Air.
description.it: Magic Stone that adds 20% Water Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Water Element.
description.jp: 水属性攻撃力を20％強化するマジックストーン。武器には「水」の属性が必要です。
description.kr: 물 속성 공격력을 20% 상승시키는 마법의 돌. 무기는 반드시 물 속성이 있어야 한다.
description.nl: Magic Stone that adds 20% Water Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Water Element.
description.pl: Magic Stone that adds 20% Water Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Water Element.
description.ru: Magic Stone that adds 20% Water Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Water Element.
description.sp: Piedra Mágica que otorga Daño de Agua +20% a tu Arma. El Arma debe tener Elemento de Agua.
description.sw: Magic Stone that adds 20% Water Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Water Element.
description.th: หินวิเศษที่เพิ่มWaterAttack 20% ให้กับอาวุธของคุณ อาวุธต้องมีธาตุน้ำ
description.tw: 為武器增加20%水屬性攻擊的魔法石。 武器須有水屬性。
description.vi: Đá ma thuật tăng thêm 20% Tấn công nước cho Vũ khí của bạn. Vũ khí phải có Nguyên tố nước.
